Name: A Blooming Errand (Part of The End of the Celestial Ministry)
Author: Bitter

Coordinates.Name: [Snowden] Find an alpine lily in Snowden Drifts
[Fields of Ruin] Find a yellow gentian flower in the Fields of Ruin.
[Wayfarer] Find a pungent gladiolus in the Wayfarer Foothills.
[Seitung] Assist Researcher Yon in Seitung Province to receive crimson sunflowers.
